title: 3D Furniture Visualizer
description: I'm excited to be working with a local furniture store on a custom 3D furniture visualizer that allows users to upload their own furniture images and see how they would look in their home.

title: Brewery Site Improvements
description: I provide custom website solutions for breweries that incorporate clean design and a dead simple way to update their current tap list.

title: LPGA.com & LPGA Mobile App
description: I was the lead front-end developer for the LPGA.com and LPGA Mobile App. I was responsible for the front-end team, and the development of all the UI components and pages. I worked closely with the project manager to ensure the project stayed on track and we had the appropriate resources to complete the project on time. I also demoed our progress regularly to the client, and was in charge of deployments including production releases.

title: Freedom Boat Club Reservations System
description: I was the lead front-end developer for creating a new reservations system for Freedom Boat Club. The content was managed by Adobe Experience Manager, and the site was made for both members and staff who needed to manage reservations and get their customers out on the water.

title: Web Scraper
description: A client came to me with a request to scrape many websites at once. The issue was that the websites didn't use the same HTML structure or URL patterns, so I had to create a custom scraper that could handle any website the client wanted. The client could then pick and choose which website data they wanted, and the scraper would save it to a CSV file.

title: RedAwning Native App
description: I was the lead UI developer at RedAwning and created their native app from scratch using React Native. It allowed their customers to manage their reservations and had cool features like automatically checking in to their vacation rental when they arrived.

title: PaperNFTs
description: Designed, developed, and launched a full dynamically-generated NFT collection utilizing Web3 technology. The NFTs were generated using pictures I took of actual construction paper cut-outs that I cut out by hand, took pictures of, and then uploaded with transparent backgrounds. Those images were then used to construct a full NFT composed of multiple images in random patterns that portrayed unique landscapes. I implemented smart contracts, metadata generation, and blockchain integration to ensure secure and decentralized asset ownership. I also managed the entire development lifecycle, from concept and design to deployment and marketing.
